title: Understanding SQL Keywords
text: In SQL, certain keywords are used to perform specific operations on data. For example, to retrieve unique values from a column, a specific keyword is used to filter out duplicates.

title: Identifying the Correct Keyword
text: Which SQL keyword is used to retrieve unique values from a column?

title: SQL SELECT Statement
text: The SELECT statement is used to select data from a database. The data returned is stored in a result table, sometimes called the result set.

title: Using SELECT with DISTINCT
text: How would you write a query to select unique values from the 'name' column in a table called 'employees'?
